clients.name: Jean-Pierre Martin
clients.content: For our wine shipments to China, Noveo perfectly masters customs constraints and cold chain management. A trusted partner for 3 years.

clients.name: Sophie Chen
clients.content: GDP compliance and serialized traceability are crucial for our medical devices. Noveo exceeds our expectations with impeccable service.

clients.name: Thomas Schneider
clients.content: Their JIT solutions allow us to optimize our inventory and meet production deadlines. Reliability is guaranteed, even during peak activity.

clients.name: David Williams
clients.content: For transporting our energy equipment, Noveo scrupulously respects all ADR regulations. Safety and professionalism guaranteed.

clients.name: Anna Kowalski
clients.content: Their tailor-made solutions for our high-value aerospace parts bring us peace of mind and complete traceability. Excellence in service.

clients.name: Laurent Moreau
clients.content: Experts in dangerous goods, they perfectly master classifications and documentation. We trust them with our eyes closed.

clients.name: Sarah Johnson
clients.content: Their integrated TMS platform simplified all our logistics management. Real-time visibility and spectacular productivity gains.

clients.name: Philippe Leroy

questions.question: What is a freight forwarder?
questions.answer: A freight forwarder is an intermediary who organizes the transport of goods on behalf of its clients using its own means or those of third-party carriers.

questions.question: What's the difference between a freight forwarder and a customs broker?
questions.answer: A freight forwarder acts as the client's agent, while a customs broker acts on their own behalf and assumes responsibility for transport.

questions.question: How to optimize an Incoterm for your imports from China?
questions.answer: The choice of Incoterm depends on your experience, volume and risk tolerance. We guide you in this strategic decision.
